short_description.0: The Mosque of Rome is the largest Mosque of Europe and its architecture replicates and perfectly integrates itself in the heart of Italy.
short_description.1: McLay's words were intended mainly for the officers under his command. But they could just as well have been addressed to educators in our nation's schools.

short_description.3: As the film Selma screens nationwide to critical acclaim, police from Clarke County arrested nine students on Friday evening in Athens, Georgia, for organizing the first "integrated classroom" for both undocumented and documented youth at the University of Georgia.
